title: Executive Order 11591-Amending Executive Order No. 11157 as it Relates to Basic Allowances for Quarters for Members with Dependents
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 403 (g) of title 37, United States Code, and as President of the United States and Commander in Chief of the Armed Forces of the United States, section 403 (ii) of Executive Order No. 11157 of June 22, 1964, is amended by inserting the words "duty or" before the word "leave".
citation: Richard Nixon, Executive Order 11591-Amending Executive Order No. 11157 as it Relates to Basic Allowances for Quarters for Members with Dependents Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/307122
